conflictDescription: User Story A requires sharing all personal data without limits, while User Story B requires no data sharing and keeping all information only on the user's device. These goals are opposite and cannot be true at the same time.
conflictingNfrPairs: Allow sharing of all personal data without limits
Do not share any user data with others
Allow sharing of all personal data without limits
Keep all user information stored only on the user's device
userStoryASummary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain clearly how all my personal data is shared and used because I want to share everything without limits.
userStoryBSummary: As an older person, I want no data to be shared with anyone and to keep my information only on my device.
resolutionDescription: Both user stories are adjusted to allow user choice about data sharing: one to share data with clear consent, and the other to keep data private on the device. This removes direct contradiction by allowing personal control.
newUserStoryASummary: As an older adult, I want to share my personal data with clear explanations and consent, so that I can control what is shared.
newUserStoryADecomposition: Explain clearly how personal data is shared
Allow sharing of personal data with user consent
newUserStoryBSummary: As an older adult, I want to keep my personal data only on my device to protect my privacy.
newUserStoryBDecomposition: Do not share any user data with others without consent
Store all user information only on the user's device

conflictDescription: User Story A wants to share all personal data without limits, but User Story B wants to keep all user data private with no sharing. These goals directly oppose each other and cannot happen at the same time.
conflictingNfrPairs: Allow sharing of all personal data without limits
Keep all user data private with no sharing
userStoryASummary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain clearly how all my personal data is shared and used because I want to share everything without limits.
userStoryBSummary: As an older person, I want all my data to stay private with no sharing and almost no notifications so I feel safe and in control.
resolutionDescription: We balance privacy and sharing by allowing users to share personal data only with clear consent and control, while ensuring data not shared stays private and notifications are minimal.
newUserStoryASummary: As an older adult, I want to share my personal data with clear consent, so I control what is shared safely.
newUserStoryADecomposition: Enable sharing personal data only after user consent
Provide clear explanations about data sharing
Allow user control over what data is shared
newUserStoryBSummary: As an older person, I want my data to stay private unless I agree, with few notifications to feel safe.
newUserStoryBDecomposition: Keep user data private by default
Allow sharing only with user approval
